title: Executive Assistant for Online Info Coaching Business
job_overview:
We are a fast-growth coaching company helping men launch and scale home service businesses. Our START and SCALE programs help beginners and underperforming entrepreneurs hit $10K/month in 90 days. We operate with speed, systems, and high standards. The mission: help blue-collar men unlock freedom through discipline, skill, and entrepreneurship.

Role Overview
We’re hiring a high-performance Executive Assistant to support our CEO and COO. This is not just a calendar manager role. You’ll be embedded in operations, helping drive projects, solve problems, and keep the company moving fast.

Key Responsibilities

- Manage executive inbox and calendar with extreme attention to detail

- Coordinate meetings, travel, and logistics with no dropped balls

- Track projects across sales, operations, and delivery

- Support recruiting: post job ads, screen candidates, coordinate interviews

- Maintain and help improve SOPs and internal systems (Notion, Slack, N8N, drive)

- Communicate with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers to ensure accountability and follow-through

- Execute ad hoc research, tasks, and logistics as needed

PLEASE NOTE: 

We will only be screening applicants using a MINIMUM of 10 apply points to apply to this role. 
If you use under 10 apply points you will NOT be considered
